main event: On August 7, 1952, two observers spotted a bright, disc-shaped object hovering over a wooded area in Vienna, Virginia.
interesting points: The disc-shaped object was approximately 30-40 feet in diameter and emitted a faint, pulsating glow., The observers noticed the object hovering for several minutes before it suddenly accelerated at tremendous speed and disappeared., An investigation was launched by local police, but no further evidence of the object was located., This incident was classified as a UFO in Project Blue Book records., The sighting had two reliable independent witnesses, Mr. X and Mr. Y.
witness description: Mr. X and Mr. Y, considered reliable witnesses
